titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on strontium halophosphate doped with europium.
A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on strontium halophosphate doped with europium.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on strontium halophosphate doped with europium.
